title: DOJ indicates it’s considering Google breakup following monopoly ruling
content: The Department of Justice late Tuesday indicated that it was considering a possible breakup of Google as an antitrust remedy.
summary: The Department of Justice late Tuesday indicated that it was considering a possible breakup of Google as an antitrust remedy.

title: Baidu's robotaxi unit is exploring expansion into global markets in the 'near future'
content: Chinese tech company Baidu's robotaxi unit Apollo Go is in talks to expand overseas in the near future, according to a source familiar with the situation.
summary: Chinese tech company Baidu's robotaxi unit Apollo Go is in talks to expand overseas in the near future, according to a source familiar with the situation.

title: New Zealand central bank slashes rates by 50 basis points in second straight rate cut
content: The RBNZ slashed rates from 5.25% to 4.75% on Wednesday, marking its second straight cut to its interest rate since August.
summary: The RBNZ slashed rates from 5.25% to 4.75% on Wednesday, marking its second straight cut to its interest rate since August.

title: China's growth is set to slow next year despite temporary boost from stimulus, World Bank warns
content: China's economic growth rate is expected to decline further in 2025 despite a temporary boost from a raft of recent stimulus measures, the World Bank says.
summary: China's economic growth rate is expected to decline further in 2025 despite a temporary boost from a raft of recent stimulus measures, the World Bank says.

title: Russia is on a 'sustained mission' to create mayhem on Europe's streets, UK spy chief says
content: The head of Britain's domestic spy agency accused Russian military intelligence of being on a "sustained mission to generate mayhem."
summary: The head of Britain's domestic spy agency accused Russian military intelligence of being on a "sustained mission to generate mayhem."

title: CNBC Daily Open: Stocks’ choppiness in October can be an opportunity
content: The see-saw motion of stocks in October isn’t all that bad if investors can seize the right time to enter the market or solidify their positions further.
summary: The see-saw motion of stocks in October isn’t all that bad if investors can seize the right time to enter the market or solidify their positions further.

title: This 42-year-old built a $2 billion a year super app called Grab: I worked '20 hour' days
content: Anthony Tan, 42, is the co-founder and CEO of Grab. As of 2023, the company serves 35 million customers and provides 13 million gig jobs across Southeast Asia.
summary: Anthony Tan, 42, is the co-founder and CEO of Grab. As of 2023, the company serves 35 million customers and provides 13 million gig jobs across Southeast Asia.

title: ‘She doesn't stop talking’: How extroverts unknowingly irritate fellow travelers
content: Hours of chatting. Jam-packed vacation days. The same activities that extroverts thrive on can overwhelm their introverted travel companions.
summary: Hours of chatting. Jam-packed vacation days. The same activities that extroverts thrive on can overwhelm their introverted travel companions.

title: S&P's Dan Yergin warns of 'dangerous time' for global economy as Middle East tensions fester

summary: The global economy is staring at a "dangerous time" like never before as Middle East tensions remain elevated, said S&P Global's vice chairman Daniel Yergin.

title: States sue TikTok over app's effects on kids' mental health
content: More than half of American teens ages 13 to 17 use TikTok, the short-form video social media app owned by ByteDance, a Chinese company.

title: Apple could launch a ring to rival Samsung by 2026, research firm predicts

title: Brazil lifts ban on X after Elon Musk complies with court orders
content: Following a months-long standoff with the country's supreme court, X is coming back online in Brazil.

title: Harris is borrowing from 'Republican playbook' as she leads Trump in new national poll

title: Trump Media stock soars nearly 19% as DJT extends longest rally since June

title: GM expects 2025 earnings to be similar to this year's despite industry headwinds
content: The Detroit automaker's targeted adjusted earnings before interest and taxes this year is between $13 billion and $15 billion, or $9.50 and $10.50 per share.

title: Jim Cramer looks at Amazon and Apple and why it can be tough to sit on good stocks
content: Cramer recapped action in the stocks of Apple and Amazon, which received downgrades on Monday — ratings with which he disagreed. Both recovered by Tuesday.

title: Chinese travelers trickle back to a Taiwanese island, mere miles from the mainland
content: Tourism has slowly started to resume on Kinmen, a remote Taiwanese island 1.8 miles from China that once thrived on visitors from the mainland.
